document.full_text: nearly three quarters of those seeking health insurance in the u.s. individual market in recent years faced roadblocks or were turned down due to prior medical conditions, a report released on wednesday said.
document.title: health coverage still tough to get for individuals
lines_and_colors: nearly three quarters of those seeking health insurance in the u.s. individual market in recent years faced roadblocks or were turned down due to prior medical conditions, a report released on wednesday said.
